title: Snowflakes & Fire Escapes
description: Cody Moran and Gracie Callaghan wanted nothing more than to escape the life they'd been born into, but it's the kind of life that doesn't like to let go. A story of love and heartache spanning the streets of Hell's Kitchen to far, far away, where it doesn't snow. *Previously available in the All I Want Anthology*
author: J.M. Darhower
